entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Convert to 'switch' statement changes behaviour #71295
  • IDE0120 does not work in various cases (Where+Count) #71293
  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread (ROS<T> -> ImmutableArray<T>) #71292
  • Use `ReadOnlySpan<T>` properties instead of static array fields #71291
  • SearchGraphQueryTests_NavigateTo.SearchForMember is broken in release/dev17.9 branch #71290

Closed

  • default 'csharp_style_prefer_primary_constructors' to false #71294
  • Collection expressions should use AddRange(ReadOnlySpan) when available and compatible to bulk add spread elements. #69626
  • IDE0305 recommends collection expression that results in worse IL #70656
    17.9
  • Analyzer suggestion `IDE0305` ("Collection initialization can be simplified") leads to performance regressions #69988

PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Params Collections: Implement "Better function member" section of the proposal #71271
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71274
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide 'return' keyword in attribute context for accessor #71288
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Speed up integration test build by only building required dependencies #71289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
